com.adobe.acs.commons.dam

Class AbstractRenditionModifyingProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.day.cq.dam.commons.process.AbstractAssetWorkflowProcess
      • com.adobe.acs.commons.dam.AbstractRenditionModifyingProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.day.cq.workflow.exec.WorkflowProcess

    public abstract class AbstractRenditionModifyingProcess
extends com.day.cq.dam.commons.process.AbstractAssetWorkflowProcess
    Abstract asset workflow which performs some action on a particular rendition (which was presumably created by an earlier workflow process). Arguments:
    • renditionName - The name of the rendition to modify.

      • getQuality

        protected final double getQuality(double base,
                String qualityStr)
        Parse the provided quality string, from 1 to 100, and apply it to the base. Allows for a constant scale to be used and applied to different image types which support different quality scales.
        Parameters:
        base - the maximal quality value
        qualityStr - the string to parse
        Returns:
        a usable quality value
